flawed_nl_solution:
His new deadlift is 300*2.5+100=<<300*2.5+100=850>>850 pounds
So he added 850-300=<<850-300=550>>550 pounds to his deadlift
This took 18-13=<<18-13=2>>2 years
So he added 550/2=<<550/2=275>>275 pounds per year
#### 275

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 2. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
